function RYU_EP04_21()
    -- .結-2【12月第4週】「姫選挙-姫巫女ｖｓ姫騎士-」
    SaveData.Title = "姫選挙-姫巫女ｖｓ姫騎士-"

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ea")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ea")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    -- //BG：黒バック
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ee")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,300)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,300,30000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //SE：姫巫女コール

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0481.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Announcement】
 "Uran-chan!!! Please step onto the stage!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0755.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes." ]])

    MSG([[ Still unsettled by Nemesia-san’s words echoing in my chest, I stepped up onto the stage. ]])

    -- //BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：エルメス（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM12.wav",2000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0482.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ladies & Gentle-girls<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Now, now, now! It’s time for the Princess Election everyone’s been waiting for!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0483.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Today’s contenders vying for votes are—my sister and the academy’s top handsome girl, the Princess Knight Daria-chan!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0484.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "And the academy’s most prestigious family’s daughter, the conservative head who values Yuriai Private Academy’s traditions above all else, the Princess Priestess Uran-chan!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0485.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Both are incredibly, incredibly cute! But today... we have to decide who is cuter..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0486.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Everyone~?<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Are you ready to vote? Hehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    -- SE：歓声（MAX）
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のウラン（決意・対ダリア）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0530.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I’ve always wanted to settle this with you, Uran-kun." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0756.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "As have I, Daria-san." ]])

    MSG([[ Then Uran-san faced Daria-san in the center. ]])

    -- //CI：ダリアBU（笑顔）顔左半分を切り抜き 147
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG024ea")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,280,0)
    SET_CUTIN_21_XL(450,500)

    MSG([[ Daria-san wore the same calm smile as before. ]])

    MSG([[ That unchanged expression gave an even greater impression of intimidation and confidence. ]])

    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(201,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    RESET_CUTIN_20_LEFT(450,500)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0757.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I will soon make that confidence crumble before your eyes. Then you will apologize to Marika-sama." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0531.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Try it if you can. For one as fragile as you." ]])


    STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    -- //BG：選挙ステージ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ea")
    -- //BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0487.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Okay, let me explain the rules for this round<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> It’s a little special today, so listen carefully~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0488.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The theme for this Princess Election is ‘Martial Arts’! Daria-chan and Uran-chan will have a sparring match starting now!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0489.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Oh, sparring means one-on-one exchanging techniques! It’s originally a karate term, but the moves don’t have to be just karate!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0490.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Actually, no punching or kicking! There’s a soft mat underneath, but dangerous throws are also off-limits!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0491.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "In the Princess Election, cuteness is justice<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> No cuteness is a no-no! Fight beautifully and gracefully without injuring the opponent~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0758.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "If it’s neither karate nor judo, what will be the judging criteria for the match?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0492.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Good question, Uran-chan! That’s actually the most special part this time!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01fc")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0493.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’m not well-versed in ‘martial arts,’ so I decided to have the audience be the judges~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0494.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’ll stop the match when I think ‘this is it!’ so everyone vote with your tablets for whoever you think is ‘cute’<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI148a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(500)

    -- //CI：得票率 ダリア50：ウラン50 148

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0495.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "By the way, here’s the current voting rate! Wow, it’s perfectly even!? Amazing, amazing, isn’t it super exciting? What will happen next!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0496.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "When I’ve stopped the match three times, the one with the most votes will be the winner of this Princess Election<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0497.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "An intense battle between two equally popular and skilled girls!! I’m so excited and fluttering with anticipation~~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    -- SE：歓声（MAX）
PLAY_SE("SEf001_2.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ The audience erupted in cheer at Hermes-san’s explanation. A sparring match with no striking and heavily restricted throws. ]])

    MSG([[ Also, since many of the judges lack martial arts experience, they must rely on flashy, eye-catching finishing moves. ]])

    MSG([[ Conditions that make a proper match difficult. ]])

    -- //BU：ダリア（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(49,"BG024ee")
    LAYER_POSITION(49,-500,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_MASK(51,"frame00",49,50)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0532.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I heard the Ryuguuin family studies Aikido... do you have practical experience?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(54,"BG024ee")
    LAYER_POSITION(54,500,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_MASK(56,"frame00r",54,55)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0759.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I leave that to your imagination." ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    MSG([[ However, Uran-san showed no sign of panic. ]])

    MSG([[ Knowing the rules would be like this, Uran-san trained relentlessly for as long as her stamina allowed. ]])

    MSG([[ For a practitioner focused on Aikido like her, this rule is probably advantageous. ]])

    STOP_SE("SEf001_2.wav",1000)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(54,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-1100,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(56,-500,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(49,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,1100,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(51,500,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(54,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(56,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(49,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(51,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(49,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_MASK(51,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(54,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_MASK(56,"")

    -- //BU：エルメス（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0498.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Uran-chan, Daria-chan, are you both ready? Then, let’s begin~~~!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0499.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The Super Princess Battle begins now~!" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

STOP_BGM(2000)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Hermes-san bounced as she left behind the stage. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM16.wav")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のウラン（決意・対ダリア）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 1000,false)

    -- //CI：ウランBU（真剣）目元切り抜き 054
    LAYER_LOAD(210,"BG024ee")
    LAYER_POSITION(210,470,-170)
    LAYER_LOAD(211,"BUL_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(211,0,-272)

    -- //CI：ダリアBU（笑顔）目元切り抜き 149
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG024ea")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_POSITION(200,-200,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,70)

    SET_CUTIN_02_03_S(310, -50, 500)

    MSG([[ Uran-san spread her arms and locked eyes with Daria-san. Daria-san faced her naturally without getting into a stance. ]])

    MSG([[ On Daria-san’s face, a hint of carelessness was visible. It was clear she intended to go easy on Uran-san. ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_02_03(310, -50, 500)

    MSG([[ The lucky break I hoped for actually happened. ]])

    MSG([[ This was perfect to ease Uran-san’s worries. ]])

    MSG([[ The fear was— ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    -- //特殊選択肢
    -- 　⇒体力

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_1_RYU,"『武道』におけるウランさんの不安材料は？")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_10", "RYU_EP04_21")
        return
    end

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1921.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Now, Uran-san!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0760.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "—Yes!" ]])

    -- //CI：ウランBU（真剣）目元切り抜き 054
    LAYER_LOAD(210,"BG024ea")
    LAYER_SCALE(210,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(210, 7)
    LAYER_POSITION(210,410,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(211,"BUL_RYU01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(211,0,-15)
    SET_CUTIN_03_S(230, 500)

    MSG([[ Uran-san closed the distance quickly and grabbed Daria-san’s arm. ]])

    MSG([[ At the same time, she threw her— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0533.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Eh—" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    RESET_CUTIN_00()
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029",300,false)

    -- //CG：ステージ上のウラン（決意・相手なし）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask029" , 300,false)

    -- //SE：床に叩きつけられる音
PLAY_SE("SEc018.wav")
WAIT(400)

    MSG([[ Daria-san’s body bounced on the floor. Uran-san cleverly seized the moment and swiftly threw her. ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san seemed momentarily stunned, blinking while lying on her back. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0500.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "S-stop! I’ll pause for a moment! Daria-chan, are you okay? Did that hurt?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0534.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I-I’m fine..." ]])

    -- //CG：ステージ上のウラン（真剣・対ダリア・真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001ab")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Daria-san stood up and took a stance again. The earlier hint of carelessness had vanished from her expression. ]])

    -- //CI：得票率 ダリア30：ウラン70 150
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI150a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ The vote gap had widened. If Uran-san gains one more win, she will be the victor of this Princess Election. ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0535.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...You’ve done well, Uran-kun." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0536.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "I apologize for underestimating your martial arts skills." ]])

    -- //CI：ダリアBU（真剣）目元アップ 010
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,-50)
    SET_CUTIN_01_S(200, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1922.500")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "!?" ]])

    MSG([[ Daria-san’s fierce gaze grew even stronger. ]])

    MSG([[ The murderous aura was palpable even to the audience. It seemed she had completely switched to serious mode after that first blow. ]])

    MSG([[ Even I, behind the stage, broke out in a cold sweat. No amateur could stay calm under such an aura. ]])

    RESET_CUTIN_01(200, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0761.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "U…uuu…" ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san was clearly shaken. At this rate, she would be overwhelmed by Daria-san. ]])

    MSG([[ —May my voice reach her. I shouted with all my strength to support Uran-san. ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    -- //：特殊選択肢
    -- 　⇒【ウランさん】

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP04_2_RYU,"ウランさんに精いっぱい呼びかけよう！")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_10", "RYU_EP04_21")
        return
    end

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0762.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san, please rest assured... I will not lose." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san took a step closer to Daria-san. Despite the terrifying fear making her tremble, her courage was incredible. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1923.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san! One more point and you win! Do your best!" ]])

    MSG([[ Even as I said that, I know well the weight of that last point. ]])

    MSG([[ The first point was certainly not won by skill. ]])

    MSG([[ It was arrogance born from overwhelming difference in ability. She only succeeded because of a surprise attack. ]])

    MSG([[ But the remaining point must be earned fairly by defeating the academy’s top martial artist. ]])

    -- //SE：摺り足（ｽﾞｽﾞｯ…）
PLAY_SE("SEa014.wav")
WAIT(300)

    MSG([[ Uran-san slid forward toward Daria-san. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //SE：摺り足（ｽﾞｽﾞｯ…）
PLAY_SE("SEa014.wav")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のウラン（真剣・対ダリア接近1m）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001ab")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ One meter remaining. Close enough to grab with one step. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //SE：摺り足（ｽﾞｽﾞｯ…）
PLAY_SE("SEa014.wav")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のウラン（真剣・対ダリア接近50cm）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001ab")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    LAYER_SCALE(50,110,110)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Fifty centimeters remaining. Close enough to reach with an outstretched arm. ]])

    --LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //SE：摺り足（ｽﾞｽﾞｯ…）
PLAY_SE("SEa014.wav")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のウラン（真剣・対ダリア接近眼前）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVc001ab")
    --SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BU_DAR01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    LAYER_SCALE(50,120,120)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    MSG([[ Thirty centimeters remaining. Close enough to hold each other’s hands and dance. ]])

    MSG([[ A spectator’s scream rose somewhere. Surely, they were overcome by the tension. ]])

    MSG([[ Just watching, my chest felt like it would burst from this tension. Surely Uran-san’s stamina was rapidly draining. ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san is already physically fragile. The time limit is surely not far off. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0537.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "Let’s see how long your stamina lasts. A test of endurance, shall we?" ]])

    MSG([[ As they locked eyes, Daria-san halted. ]])

    MSG([[ A complete stalemate. The moment one loses focus, the match will end. ]])

    MSG([[ Clearly a strategy to drain Uran-san’s stamina. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0763.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Huu---Suu---" ]])

    MSG([[ Despite breaking out in a cold sweat, Uran-san kept her focus as they faced each other. ]])

    MSG([[ ........................ ]])

    MSG([[ A long, long silence passed, feeling almost eternal. They stared at each other for a full minute. ]])

    MSG([[ The moment this balance breaks will decide the match. Knowing this, neither could move carelessly. ]])

    MSG([[ Then suddenly, the balance broke— ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0764.wav")
